text: (napiye) innum, um iraivan vanavarkalai nokki"niccayamaka nan pumiyil oru piratinitiyai amaikkap pokiren" enru kuriyapotu, avarkal"(iraiva!) Ni atil kulappattai untakki, irattam cintuvoraiya amaikkappokiray? Innum nankalo un pukal otiyavarkalaka unnait tutittu, un paricuttataip porriyavarkalaka irukkinrom; enru kurinarkal; a(tarku irai)van"ninkal ariyatavarraiyellam niccayamaka nan ariven" enak kurinan
